Fun game, I just wish it had a stronger following.  Sometimes finding a match can take a bit longer than I prefer.
Overall, fun gameplay that the devs worked very hard to try and balance and perfect.  One of the few companies who at least tried to improve their game :)

El juego esta buenardo, me encanta que a pesar de los años le sigan añadiendo mas contenido y agregando nuevas mecánicas, los killers y survivors están muy bien para mi gusto, podes jugar solo y conocer gente """""piola""""" o bien jugar con amigos y tratar de boludear y escapar del killer. Ahora lo malo del juego es que tiene bugs que la mayoria no arreglan o bien el problema de que siempre tocan killers que campean y que solo juegan para joderte la partida, el problema no termina ahí ya que también el killer la puede pasar mal ya que le pueden tocar survivors  toxicos que se desconectan a mitad de una partida solo porque el killer hace lo que tiene que hacer-SEGUIRLOS Y MATARLOS-. En fin le voy a dar un buen puntaje porque a pesar de todo esto hay partidas que disfrutas mucho y la satisfacción que te genera escapar o acabar con los supervivientes en el caso de que seas killer no te la saca nadie <3

Until these game developers understand that they should not reward killers constantly for playing poorly, i.e. noed, giving them one hit downs i.e. iridescent heads or tombstone, killers who run and just puke on players (not objects), killers who run from one player to the next stabbing them and continue to make ANNOYING rather than frightening killers i dont think anyone should play this game. Once upon a time this was my favorite game but the more they babysit the killers the more I have grown to hate it and ultimately uninstall it. Shocking concept devs, if you want to make it to where your killer players make the game fun then do your job and encourage that for making it fun for the entire lobby instead of encouraging players to slug full teams in fear of DS, tunnel survivors, or just playing like jerks. if you want to focus on killer so much do it to make them better, not to make them more annoying. God Bless you if you still pick up this game.

Great game but by far the single most toxic community in any game ever. 
Horribly balanced in so many ways and devs don't really care.
expect harassment form salty players to the point of death threats, that is not a joke it honestly happens in this game.
Great with friends but the game is not balanced for it at all so expect one sided games most of the time.
If you want to play as Killer, you will have a horrible time. The game is and has been heavily in favor of Survivors to an absurd degree. Hope you enjoy running in circles non stop.

Play for fun with friends but don't expect balanced gameplay or decent community.

Was fairly good when it first came out..
Survivor bias makes it boring to be killer and when you play a match and a minute or so into a game and they complete 3 gens before you even get to scout them all. Now they added a lockout so if you quit a game because of the unbalanced nature of the game you cant play for 5 minutes.... 

Who locks people out of playing the whole %$£$£%% game?

I dont recommend this game anymore.
I get that the point is that the killer is super strong, but when most games don't even get the first generator started, there's clearly a balancing issue.

This game is fun yea the ranked is messed up a bit and the loading time is long but its really fun with so many different play styles. Their's a huge varity of characters and the graphics are great. Overall i would say this game is really good for its price even though it is pricey
good game

So yeah if u are not going to main a killer, you can play. If u are going to play a killer deal with the fact that u must be at least 4x better than whole lobby to "win" and still it may not be enough, cuz FUCKING SWF destroys this game. Like idk devs do something about and make another lobby for these sweaty motherfuckers or make another lobby for people who just want to chill while playing cuz it's fucking impossible to have fun while u have to run after 4 man premades who are 3-8 ranks higher than you.

Yeah matchmaking system also sucks and you are 100% sure you will play only 5-10% of your matches on your current level cuz as a killer you will usually get survivors who are few ranks higher than you. Why? Ask these idiots who made this system...

Tl;dr
Survivor main - play. Killer main - don't try it

DEAD BY DAYLIGHT сама по себе нормальная игра,но как и в любом игре есть недочеты такие как баги в этой игре можно встретить сервера с 1000ping манов которые пробивают за километр тебя в полету и конечно же долгий поиск игры в ночное время суток из за низкого онлайна,платные дополнения .Но если не смотреть на эти недочеты игра все же приличная,хочу сказать что игра стоит рублей 350 но не 500

If you enjoy playing killer, this is the game for you. When this game originally was released it was fun for everyone. Now the game seems geared towards killer so much nowadays and is off balance. 99% of time I play killer I usually make it out with everyone dead without really trying. As survivor, once I get down to rank 5 I rarely see anyone escape in a game. Not sure what happened but I used to be rank 1 survivor back in the day but now it aint happening.
cool
Ome sino chato demais, muito camper, o tio billy eo tio zenon muito paia

If you want to play this game just by expect to kill people like crazy for satisfaction, you are going to disappoint.  
And even you expect the fear and excitement as a survivor, you still not gonna get it a lot. 
What you gonna get is a real time Chess, Rock-paper-scissors kind like game under covered as a horror game. 
The game lack a lot of realistic senses and logical mechanics yet rely on made up rules of the game to win each match.
For example if you are a killer, 
- you can't kill a survivors while they are on hook, no matter you slash them over 100 times they are still not gonna die. 
- When their friend are saving them from the hook, everyone become immortal for a moment.
- Your killer character doesn't kill people the way you want to kill, i mean they are slow according to the character physical problem so you need to practice how to control their striking and master the timing, plus you can not continually hit them like in the other game.  
- You get stunt and shock easily by annoying flashlight. Sometime there are 3 - 4 flashlights shining on your face and that paralyzes you. 
- Sometime you meet years played sophisticated survivors, they are going to run around you like using footwork with colorful rainbow bubble butterfly outfit to challenge you to catch them this is a turn off for me. It totally out of the game vibe. 
- Some survivors use their back to take hit for their friend to buy sometime for their friend to run away. 
- In reality if you are a real killer you can take a hostage, you can camp, torture them, and even you camp the victim in the game, there are still a brave survivor who dare to come save their friend on the hook in front of you because they know they will become immortal at that moment. 
To me i prefer to play Manhunt a Classic Rock Star Hardcore game than this game that one is much satisfied me as a killer even it is outdated graphic. Friday 13th is another option if you don't like this game but the Friday 13th they randomly pick a role for you, unlike this game you can choose to be a killer in exchange with long time game loading if your killer is not at level 50.
I like the concept of the game to make it like chess but i need it to be more realistic and make more sense with horror experience.

Bad game overall! Played this game for 500 hours and in every game i find glitches.The developers don t give a shit about their community and they add shit ton of skins instead of fixing their stupid game.For the average casual player i don t recommend this game because it will make you more annoyed the chill you down.The process of learning the game takes a lot of time but instead of getting a skill based matchmaking like in the most popular games: Fortnite, Counter Strike Global Offensive and Rainbow Six Siege you get matched up with players that will destroy you.If you re rank 9 (green ranks) you ll get matched up against red ranks ( rank 4 3 2 and 1).The balance is also shit,killers can use mories and survivors can use stupid keys to open the hatch but who cares when you can buy a furry cosmetic from the shop by spending 10 dollars am i right ? Jokes aside the game is semi-decent , but the developers don t care about their community.
